name: Crabwatch
description:
A game from Frieda and Andrea for the Mini Jam 108: Seaside. 
We hope you can enjoy what we came up with over the weekend :)

Description:

Just another normal day at Sandcastle beach.

Gary the crab is almost starving. While looking for food he encounters Sandcastle beach, where he spots a lot of delicious humans and decides to eat them one by one until he is satisfied!
Unfortunately he decided for the one and only beach that is protected by the crabwatchers B)
It's just another normal day for the crabwatchers, doing crabwatcher stuff. Jeremy is the head of the crabwatchers and is watching over the beach, protecting the people from man-eating crabs. The moment he sees Garry, he feels that it's his time to shine!
Ignoring all the lives, he only has one goal: Stopping Gary!

Who is going to win this awesome battle?!

Crabwatch is an awesome 2-player shooter, where you and your friends can play as either Gary the crab or Jeremy the crabwatcher.

Controls:
 Gary (WASD) --> can't run through objects, eats people when colliding with them
Jeremy (Arrow keys + mouse to shoot) --> can run through objects, but can't shoot through them. He can also shoot the people so Gary can't eat them! He would do anything in order to stop Gary! Who cares about the beach visitors anway~

Sounds we used:

Background music:
https://www.free-stock-music.com/beach-time.html

Background ocean sounds:
Sea waves with birds loop
https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/sea/

Shooting sound:
Fish flapping
https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/splash/

Michael Jackson:
https://www.101soundboards.com/boards/29214-michael-jackson-grunts
